Html:
Hello,

 

I am making my way through the Music Store tutorial.  I am now in pages 44-48, trying to link the sample database to the MVC code.  When I run the code and browse to localhost../Store, I get this message:

 

SqlException was unhandled by user code

"The file "\\....\\my drive \ MvcMusicStore\App_Data\MvcMusicStore2.mdf" is on a network path that is not supported for database files.
CREATE DATABASE failed. Some file names listed could not be created. Check related errors."

I don't see any other errors.

 

I tried to follow the tutorial closely, although I did have to install EntityFramework using the Project Manager Console (and install PowerShell).  I am using Windows XP and Visual Studio 2010 Premium.  My machine has MS SQL 2008 and SQL Express.

 

Any ideas? Thanks, Jason

(I tried to create a database as described in another thread here, but I got a permissions error!)
